segment_text: They were at forty feet, in darkness.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: Inside the narrow circle of his dive light, Campbell could see coral polyps feeding, their ragged edges transformed into predatory flowers.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: If anything could have saved us, he thought, this week should have been it.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: Beth's lantern wobbled as she flailed herself away from the white-petaled spines of a sea urchin.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: She wore nothing but a white T-shirt over her bikini, despite Campbell's warnings, and he could see gooseflesh on her thighs.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: Which is as much of her body, he thought, as I've seen in ... how long? Five weeks? Six?
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: He couldn't remember the last time they'd made love.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: As he moved his light away he thought he saw a shape in the darkness.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: Shark, he thought, and felt his throat tighten. He swung the lamp back again.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: That was when he saw her.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: She was frozen by the glare, like any wild animal. Her long straight hair floated up from her shoulders and blended into the darkness.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: The nipples of her bare breasts were elliptical and purple in the night water.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: Her legs merged into a green, scaly tail.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: Campbell listened to his breath rasp into the regulator.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: He could see the width of her cheekbones, the paleness of her eyes, the frightened tremor of the gills around her neck.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: Then reflex took over and he brought up his Nikonos and fired. The flare of the strobe shocked her to life.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: She shuddered, flicked her crescent tail toward him, and disappeared.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: A sudden, inexplicable longing overwhelmed him. He dropped the camera and swam after her, legs pumping, pulling with both arms.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: As he reached the edge of a hundred-foot drop-off, he swept the light in an arc that picked up a final glimpse of her, heading down and to the west. Then she was gone.
scene_description: underwater, dark water, coral polyps, dive light circle

segment_text: He found Beth on the surface, shivering and enraged.
scene_description: outdoors, ocean surface, dark water, choppy waves

segment_text: "What the hell was the idea of leaving me alone like that? I was scared to death. You heard what that guy said about sharks--"
scene_description: outdoors, ocean surface, dark water, choppy waves

segment_text: "I saw something," Campbell said.
scene_description: outdoors, ocean surface, dark water, choppy waves

segment_text: "Fan-fucking-tastic." She rode low in the water, and Campbell watched her catch a wave in her open mouth.
scene_description: outdoors, ocean surface, dark water, choppy waves

segment_text: She spat it out and said, "Were you taking a look or just running away?"
scene_description: outdoors, ocean surface, dark water, choppy waves

segment_text: "Blow up your vest," Campbell said, feeling numb, desolate, "before you drown yourself." He turned his back to her and swam for the boat.
scene_description: outdoors, ocean surface, dark water, choppy waves

segment_text: Showered, sitting outside his cabin in the moonlight, Campbell began to doubt himself.
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, cabin exterior, tropical foliage

segment_text: Beth was already cocooned in a flannel nightgown near her edge of the bed. She would lie there, Campbell knew, sometimes not even bothering to close her eyes, until he was asleep.
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, cabin exterior, tropical foliage

segment_text: His recurring, obsessive daydreams were what had brought him here to the island. How could he be sure he hadn't hallucinated that creature out on the reef?
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, cabin exterior, tropical foliage

segment_text: He'd told Beth that they'd been lucky to be picked for the vacation, that he'd applied for it months before.
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, cabin exterior, tropical foliage

segment_text: In fact, his fantasies had so utterly destroyed his concentration at work that the company had ordered him to come to the island or submit to a complete course of psych testing.
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, cabin exterior, tropical foliage

segment_text: He'd been more frightened than he was willing to admit. The fantasies had progressed from the mild violence of smashing his CRT screen to a bizarre, sinister image of himself floating outside his shattered office windows, not falling the forty stories to the street, just drifting there in the whitish smog.
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, cabin exterior, tropical foliage

segment_text: High above him, Campbell could see the company bar, glittering like a chrome-and-steel monster just hatched from its larval stage.
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, cabin exterior, tropical foliage

segment_text: He shook his head. Obviously he needed sleep. Just one good night's rest and things would get back to normal.
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, cabin exterior, tropical foliage

segment_text: In the morning Campbell went out on the dive boat while Beth slept in. He was distracted, clumsy, bothered by shadows in his peripheral vision.
scene_description: outdoors, boat deck, dive tanks, ocean background

segment_text: The dive master wandered over while they were changing tanks and asked him, "You nervous about something!"
scene_description: outdoors, boat deck, dive tanks, ocean background

segment_text: "No," Campbell said. "I'm fine."
scene_description: outdoors, boat deck, dive tanks, ocean background

segment_text: "There's no sharks on this part of the reef, you know."
scene_description: outdoors, boat deck, dive tanks, ocean background

segment_text: "It's not that," Campbell said. "There's no problem. Really."
scene_description: outdoors, boat deck, dive tanks, ocean background

segment_text: He read the look in the dive master's eyes: another case of shell shock. The company must turn them out by the dozens, Campbell thought.
scene_description: outdoors, boat deck, dive tanks, ocean background

segment_text: The stressed-out executives and the boardroom victims, all with the same glazed expressions.
scene_description: outdoors, boat deck, dive tanks, ocean background

segment_text: That afternoon they dove a small wreck at the east end of the island. Beth paired off with another woman, so Campbell stayed with his partner from the morning, a balding pilot from the Cincinnati office.
scene_description: underwater, sunken wreck, rotting wood, sunlit water

segment_text: The wreck was no more than a husk, an empty shell, and Campbell floated to one side as the others crawled over the rotting wood.
scene_description: underwater, sunken wreck, rotting wood, sunlit water

segment_text: His sense of purpose had disappeared, left him wanting only the weightlessness and lack of color of the deep water.
scene_description: underwater, sunken wreck, rotting wood, sunlit water

segment_text: After dinner he followed Beth out onto the patio. He'd lost track of how long he'd been watching the clouds over the dark water when she said, "I don't like this place."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: Campbell looked back at her. She was sleek and pristine in her white linen jacket, the sleeves pushed up to her elbows, her still-damp hair twisted into a chignon and spiked with an orchid.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: She'd been sulking into her brandy since they'd finished dinner, and once again she'd astonished him with her ability to exist in a completely separate mental universe from his own.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "Why not?"
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "It's fake. Unreal. This whole island." She swirled the brandy but didn't drink any of it.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "What business does an American company have owning an entire island? What happened to the people who used to live here?"
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "In the first place," Campbell said, "it's a multinational company, not just American. And the people are still living here, only now they've got jobs instead of starving to death."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: As usual, Beth had him on the defensive. In fact he wasn't all that thrilled with the Americanization of the island.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: He'd imagined natives with guitars and congas, not portable stereos that blasted electronic reggae and neo-funk. The hut where he and Beth slept was some kind of geodesic dome, air-conditioned and comfortable, but he missed the sound of the ocean.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "I just don't like it," Beth said. "I don't like top secret projects that have to be kept behind electric fences. I don't like the company flying people out here for vacations the way they'd throw a bone to a dog."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: Or a straw to a drowning man, Campbell thought. He was as curious as anybody about the installations at the west end of the island, but of course that wasn't the point.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: He and Beth were walking through the steps of a dance that Campbell now saw would inevitably end in divorce. Their friends had all been divorced at least once, and an eighteen-year marriage probably seemed as anachronistic to them as a 1957 Chevy.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "Why don't you just admit it?" Campbell said. "The only thing you really don't like about the island is the fact that you're stuck here with me."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: She stood up, and Campbell felt, with numbing jealousy, the stares of men all around them focus on her.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "I'll see you later," she said, and heads turned to follow the clatter of her sandals.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: Campbell ordered another Salva Vida and watched her walk downhill. The stairs were lit with Japanese lanterns and surrounded by wild purple and orange flowers.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: By the time she reached the sandbar and the line of cabins, she was no more than a shadow, and Campbell had finished most of the beer.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: Now that she was gone, he felt drained and a little dizzy. He looked at his hands, still puckered from the long hours in the water, at the cuts and bruises of three days of physical activity.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: Soft hands, the hands of a company man, a desk man. Hands that would push a pencil or type on a CRT for another twenty years, then retire to the remote control of a big-screen TV.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: The thick, caramel-tasting beer was starting to catch up to him. He shook his head and got up to find the bathroom.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: His reflection shimmered and melted in the warped mirror over the bathroom sink. He realized he was stalling, staying away from the chill, sterile air of the cabin as long as he could.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: And then there were the dreams. They'd gotten worse since he'd come to the island, more vivid and disturbing every night.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: He couldn't remember details, only slow, erotic sensations along his skin, a sense of floating in thin, crystalline water, of rolling in frictionless sheets. He'd awaken from them gasping for air like a drowning fish, his penis swollen and throbbing.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: He brought another beer back to his table, not really wanting it, just needing to hold it in his hands. His attention kept wandering to a table on a lower level, where a rather plain young woman sat talking with two men in glasses and dress shirts.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: He couldn't understand what was so familiar about her until she tilted her head in a puzzled gesture and he recognized her. The broad cheekbones, the pale eyes.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: He could hear the sound of his own heart. Was it just some kind of prank, then? A woman in a costume?
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: But what about the gill lines he'd seen on her neck? How in God's name had she moved so quickly?
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: She stood up, made apologetic gestures to her friends. Campbell's table was near the stairs, and he saw she would have to pass him on her way out.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: Before he could stop to think about it, he stood up, blocking her exit, and said, "Excuse me?"
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "Yes?" She was not that physically attractive, he thought, but he was drawn to her anyway, in spite of the heaviness of her waist, her solid, shortish legs.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: Her face was older, more tired than the one he'd seen out on the reef. But similar, too close for coincidence.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "I wanted to ... could I buy you a drink?" Maybe, he thought, I'm just losing my mind.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: She smiled, and her eyes crinkled warmly. "I'm sorry. It's really very late, and I have to be at work in the morning."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "Please," Campbell said. "Just for a minute or two." He could see her suspicion, and behind that a faint glow of flattered ego.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: She wasn't used to being approached by men, he realized. "I just want to talk with you."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "You're not a reporter, are you?"
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "No, nothing like that." He searched for something reassuring. "I'm with the company. The Houston office."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: The magic words, Campbell thought. She sat down in Beth's chair and said, "I don't know if I should have any more. I'm about half looped as it is."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: Campbell nodded, said, "You work here, then."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "That's right."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "Secretary?"
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "Biologist," she said, a little sharply. "I'm Dr. Kimberly."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: When he didn't react to the name, she softened it by adding, "Joan Kimberly."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "I'm sorry," Campbell said. "I always thought biologists were supposed to be homely." The flirtation came easily.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: She had the same beauty as the creature on the reef, a sort of fierce shyness and alien sensuality, but in the woman they were more deeply buried.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: My God, Campbell thought, I'm actually doing this, actually trying to seduce this woman.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: He glanced at the swelling of her breasts, knowing what they would look like without the blue oxford shirt she wore, and the knowledge became a warmth in his groin.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "Maybe I'd better have that drink," she said. Campbell signaled the waiter.
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "I can't imagine what it would be like to live here," he said. "To see this every day."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "You get used to it," she said. "I mean, it's still unbearably beautiful sometimes, but you have your work, and your life goes on. You know?"
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: "Yes," Campbell said. "I know exactly what you mean."
scene_description: outdoors, resort patio, tables chairs, Japanese lanterns, distant ocean

segment_text: She let Campbell walk her home. Her loneliness and vulnerability were like a heavy perfume, so strong it repelled him at the same time that it pulled him irresistibly toward her.
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, hillside cabin, palm trees, bougainvilleas

segment_text: She stopped at the doorway of her cabin, another geodesic. This one sat high on the hill, buried in a grove of palms and bougainvilleas.
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, hillside cabin, palm trees, bougainvilleas

segment_text: The sexual tension was so strong that Campbell could feel his shirtfront trembling.
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, hillside cabin, palm trees, bougainvilleas

segment_text: "Thank you," she said, her voice rough. "You're very easy to talk to."
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, hillside cabin, palm trees, bougainvilleas

segment_text: He could have turned away then, but he couldn't seem to unravel himself. He put his arms around her, and her mouth bumped against his, awkwardly.
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, hillside cabin, palm trees, bougainvilleas

segment_text: Then her lips began to move and her tongue flicked out eagerly. She got the door open without moving away from him, and they nearly fell into the house.
scene_description: outdoors, moonlit night, hillside cabin, palm trees, bougainvilleas

segment_text: He pushed himself up on extended arms and watched her moving beneath him. The moonlight through the trees was green and watery, falling in slow waves across the bed.
scene_description: indoors, bedroom, moonlight through trees, bed, shadows

segment_text: Her breasts swayed heavily as she arched and twisted her back, the breath bubbling in her throat. Her eyes were clenched tight, and her legs wrapped around his and held them, like a long forked tail.
scene_description: indoors, bedroom, moonlight through trees, bed, shadows

segment_text: Before dawn he slid out from under her limp right arm and got into his clothes. She was still asleep as he let himself out.
scene_description: outdoors, rocky hilltop, sunrise glow, distant lagoon, barrier reef

segment_text: He'd meant to go back to his cabin, but instead he found himself climbing to the top of the island's rocky spine to wait for the sun to come up.
scene_description: outdoors, rocky hilltop, sunrise glow, distant lagoon, barrier reef

segment_text: He hadn't even showered. Kimberly's perfume and musk clung to his hands and crotch like sexual stigmata.
scene_description: outdoors, rocky hilltop, sunrise glow, distant lagoon, barrier reef

segment_text: It was Campbell's first infidelity in eighteen years of marriage, a final, irreversible act.
scene_description: outdoors, rocky hilltop, sunrise glow, distant lagoon, barrier reef

segment_text: He knew most of the jargon. Mid-life crisis and all that.
scene_description: outdoors, rocky hilltop, sunrise glow, distant lagoon, barrier reef

segment_text: He'd probably seen Kimberly at the bar some other night and not consciously remembered her, projected her face onto a fantasy with obvious Freudian water/rebirth connotations.
scene_description: outdoors, rocky hilltop, sunrise glow, distant lagoon, barrier reef

segment_text: In the dim, fractionated light of the sunrise, the lagoon was gray, the line of the barrier reef a darker smudge broken by whitecaps that curved like scales on the skin of the ocean.
scene_description: outdoors, rocky hilltop, sunrise glow, distant lagoon, barrier reef

segment_text: Dry palm fronds rustled in the breeze, and the island birds began to chirp and stutter themselves awake.
scene_description: outdoors, rocky hilltop, sunrise glow, distant lagoon, barrier reef

segment_text: A shadow broke from one of the huts on the beach below and climbed toward the road, weighted down with a large suitcase and a flight bag. Above her, in the asphalt lot at the top of the stairs, a taxi coasted silently to a stop and doused its lights.
scene_description: outdoors, rocky hilltop, sunrise glow, distant lagoon, barrier reef

segment_text: If he had run, he could have reached her and maybe could even have stopped her, but the hazy impulse never became strong enough to reach his legs.
scene_description: outdoors, rocky hilltop, sunrise glow, distant lagoon, barrier reef

segment_text: Instead, he sat until the sun was hot on his neck and his eyes were dazzled into blindness by the white sand and water.
scene_description: outdoors, rocky hilltop, sunrise glow, distant lagoon, barrier reef

segment_text: On the north side of the island, facing the mainland, the village of Espejo sprawled in the mud for the use of the resort and the company.
scene_description: outdoors, dirt track road, cinder-block houses, tropical village setting

segment_text: A dirt track ran down the middle of it, oily water standing in the ruts. The cinder-block houses on concrete piers and the Fords rusting in the yards reminded Campbell of an American suburb in the fifties, warped by nightmare.
scene_description: outdoors, dirt track road, cinder-block houses, tropical village setting

segment_text: The locals who worked in the company's kitchens and swept the company's floors lived here, and their kids scuffled in alleys that smelled of rotting fish or lay in the shade and threw rocks at three-legged dogs.
scene_description: outdoors, dirt track road, cinder-block houses, tropical village setting

segment_text: An old woman sold Saint Francis flour-sack shirts from ropes tied between pilings of her house. Under an awning of corrugated green plastic, bananas lay in heaps and flies swarmed over haunches of beef.
scene_description: outdoors, dirt track road, cinder-block houses, tropical village setting

segment_text: At the end of the main street was a farmacia with a faded yellow Kodak sign that promised One Day Service.
scene_description: outdoors, dirt track road, cinder-block houses, tropical village setting

segment_text: Campbell blinked and found his way to the back, where a ten-year-old boy was reading La Novela Policiaca. The boy set the comic on the counter and said, "Yes, sir?"
scene_description: indoors, small shop interior, counter shelves, computer screen

segment_text: "How soon can you develop these?" Campbell shoved the cartridge toward him.
scene_description: indoors, small shop interior, counter shelves, computer screen

segment_text: ¿Mande?
scene_description: indoors, small shop interior, counter shelves, computer screen

segment_text: Campbell gripped the edge of the counter. "Ready today?" he asked slowly.
scene_description: indoors, small shop interior, counter shelves, computer screen

segment_text: "Tomorrow. This time."
scene_description: indoors, small shop interior, counter shelves, computer screen

segment_text: Campbell took a twenty out of his wallet and held it face down on the scarred wood. "This afternoon?"
scene_description: indoors, small shop interior, counter shelves, computer screen

segment_text: "Momentito." The boy tapped something out on a computer terminal at his right hand.
scene_description: indoors, small shop interior, counter shelves, computer screen

segment_text: The dry clatter of the keys filled Campbell with distaste. "Tonight, okay?" the boy said. "A las seis."
scene_description: indoors, small shop interior, counter shelves, computer screen

segment_text: He touched the dial of his watch and said, "Six."
scene_description: indoors, small shop interior, counter shelves, computer screen

segment_text: "All right," Campbell said. For another five dollars he bought a pint of Canadian Club, and then he went back onto the street.
scene_description: indoors, small shop interior, counter shelves, computer screen

segment_text: He felt like a sheet of weakly colored glass, as if the sun shone clear through him. He was a fool, of course, to be taking this kind of chance with the film, but he needed that picture.
scene_description: outdoors, dirt track road, cinder-block houses, tropical village setting

segment_text: He had to know.
scene_description: outdoors, dirt track road, cinder-block houses, tropical village setting

segment_text: He anchored the boat as close as possible to where it had been the night before. He had two fresh tanks and about half the bottle of whiskey left.
scene_description: underwater, coral reef edge, deep drop-off, sunlit water, pollution

segment_text: It was barely noon, the sun a white ball of fire in the sky.
scene_description: underwater, coral reef edge, deep drop-off, sunlit water, pollution

segment_text: Diving drunk and alone was against every rule anyone had ever tried to teach him, but the idea of a simple, clean death by drowning seemed ludicrous to Campbell, not even worth consideration. Fate obviously had something more convoluted in mind for him.
scene_description: underwater, coral reef edge, deep drop-off, sunlit water, pollution

segment_text: His diving jeans and sweatshirt, still damp and salty from the night before, were suffocating him. He got into his tank as quickly as he could and rolled over the side.
scene_description: underwater, coral reef edge, deep drop-off, sunlit water, pollution

segment_text: The cool water revived him, washed him clean. He purged the air from his vest and dropped straight to the bottom.
scene_description: underwater, coral reef edge, deep drop-off, sunlit water, pollution

segment_text: Dulled by whiskey and lack of sleep, he floundered for a moment in the sand before he could get his buoyancy neutral.
scene_description: underwater, coral reef edge, deep drop-off, sunlit water, pollution

segment_text: At the edge of the drop-off he hesitated, then swam to his right, following the edge of the cliff. His physical condition made him burn air faster than he wanted to; going deeper would only make it worse.
scene_description: underwater, coral reef edge, deep drop-off, sunlit water, pollution

segment_text: The bright red of a Coke can winked at him from a coral head. He crushed it and stuck it in his belt, suddenly furious with the company and its casual rape of the island, with himself for letting them manipulate him, with Beth for leaving him, with the entire world and the human race.
scene_description: underwater, coral reef edge, deep drop-off, sunlit water, pollution

segment_text: He kicked hard, driving himself through swarms of jack and blue tang, hardly noticing the twisted, brilliantly colored landscape that moved beneath him.
scene_description: underwater, coral reef edge, deep drop-off, sunlit water, pollution

segment_text: Some of the drunkenness burned off in his first burst of energy, and he gradually slowed, wondering what he possibly could hope to accomplish. It was useless, he thought.
scene_description: underwater, coral reef edge, deep drop-off, sunlit water, pollution

segment_text: He was chasing a phantom. But he didn't turn back.
scene_description: underwater, coral reef edge, deep drop-off, sunlit water, pollution

segment_text: He was still swimming when he hit the net.
scene_description: underwater, monofilament net wall, coral reef base, deep blue water, glinting wires

segment_text: It was nearly invisible, a web of monofilament in one-foot squares, strong enough to hold a shark or a school of porpoises. He tested it with the serrated edge of his diver's knife, with no luck.
scene_description: underwater, monofilament net wall, coral reef base, deep blue water, glinting wires

segment_text: He was close to the west end of the island, where the company kept their research facility. The net followed the line of the reef as far down as he could see and extended out into the open water.
scene_description: underwater, monofilament net wall, coral reef base, deep blue water, glinting wires

segment_text: She was real, he thought. They built this to keep her in. But how did she get past it?
scene_description: underwater, monofilament net wall, coral reef base, deep blue water, glinting wires

segment_text: When he'd last seen her she'd been heading down. Campbell checked his seaview gauge, saw that he had less than five hundred pounds of air left.
scene_description: underwater, monofilament net wall, coral reef base, deep blue water, glinting wires

segment_text: Enough to take him down to a hundred feet or so and right back up. The sensible thing to do was to return to the boat and bring a fresh tank back with him.
scene_description: underwater, monofilament net wall, coral reef base, deep blue water, glinting wires

segment_text: He went down anyway.
scene_description: underwater, monofilament net wall, coral reef base, deep blue water, glinting wires

segment_text: He could see the fine wires glinting as he swam past them. They seemed bonded to the coral itself, by some process he could not even imagine.
scene_description: underwater, monofilament net wall, coral reef base, deep blue water, glinting wires

segment_text: He kept his eyes moving between the depth gauge and the edge of the net. Much deeper than a hundred feet and he would have to worry about decompression as well as an empty tank.
scene_description: underwater, monofilament net wall, coral reef base, deep blue water, glinting wires

segment_text: At 100 feet he tripped his reserve lever. Three hundred pounds and counting.
scene_description: underwater, monofilament net wall, coral reef base, deep blue water, glinting wires

segment_text: All the reds had disappeared from the coral, leaving only blues and purples. The water was noticeably darker, colder, and each breath seemed to roar into his lungs like a geyser.
scene_description: underwater, monofilament net wall, coral reef base, deep blue water, glinting wires

segment_text: Ten more feet, he told himself, and at 125 he saw the rip in the net.
scene_description: underwater, monofilament net wall, coral reef base, deep blue water, glinting wires

segment_text: He snagged his backpack on the monofilament and had to back off and try again, fighting panic. He could already feel the constriction in his lungs again, as if he were trying to breathe with a sheet of plastic over his mouth.
scene_description: underwater, cultivated kelp beds, metallic structures, submarines, blinking lights

segment_text: He'd seen tanks that had been sucked so dry that the sides caved in. They found them on divers trapped in rockslides and tangled in fishing line.
scene_description: underwater, cultivated kelp beds, metallic structures, submarines, blinking lights

segment_text: His tank slipped free and he was through, following his bubbles upward. The tiny knot of air in his lungs expanded as the pressure around him let up, but not enough to kill his need to breathe.
scene_description: underwater, cultivated kelp beds, metallic structures, submarines, blinking lights

segment_text: He pulled the last of the air out of the tank and forced himself to keep exhaling, forcing the nitrogen out of his tissues.
scene_description: underwater, cultivated kelp beds, metallic structures, submarines, blinking lights

segment_text: At fifty feet he slowed and angled toward a wall of coral, turned the comer, and swam into a sheltered lagoon.
scene_description: underwater, cultivated kelp beds, metallic structures, submarines, blinking lights

segment_text: For a few endless seconds he forgot that he had no air.
scene_description: underwater, cultivated kelp beds, metallic structures, submarines, blinking lights

segment_text: The entire floor of the lagoon was laid out in squares of greenery: kelp, mosses, and something that looked like giant cabbage.
scene_description: underwater, cultivated kelp beds, metallic structures, submarines, blinking lights

segment_text: A school of red snappers circled past him, herded by a metal box with a blinking light on the end of one long antenna. Submarines with spindly mechanical arms worked on the ocean floor, thinning the vegetation and darkening the water with chemicals.
scene_description: underwater, cultivated kelp beds, metallic structures, submarines, blinking lights

segment_text: Two or three dolphins were swimming side by side with human divers, and they seemed to be talking to each other.
scene_description: underwater, cultivated kelp beds, metallic structures, submarines, blinking lights

segment_text: His lungs straining, Campbell turned his back on them and kicked for the surface, trying to stay as close to the rocks as he could. He wanted to stop for a minute at ten feet, to give at least a nod to decompression, but it wasn't possible.
scene_description: underwater, cultivated kelp beds, metallic structures, submarines, blinking lights

segment_text: His air was gone.
scene_description: underwater, cultivated kelp beds, metallic structures, submarines, blinking lights

segment_text: He broke the surface less than a hundred feet from a concrete dock. Behind him was a row of marker buoys that traced the line of the net all the way out to sea and around the far side of the lagoon.
scene_description: outdoors, concrete dock, steaming sun, marker buoys, ocean water

segment_text: The dock lay deserted and steaming in the sun. Without a fresh tank, Campbell had no chance of getting out the way he'd come in.
scene_description: outdoors, concrete dock, steaming sun, marker buoys, ocean water

segment_text: If he swam out on the surface, he'd be as conspicuous as a drowning man. He had to find another tank or another way out.
scene_description: outdoors, concrete dock, steaming sun, marker buoys, ocean water

segment_text: Hiding his gear under a sheet of plastic, he crossed the hot concrete slab to the building behind it, a wide, low warehouse full of wooden crates.
scene_description: indoors, warehouse interior, wooden crates, dive gear rack, concrete floor

segment_text: A rack of diving gear was built into the left-hand wall. Campbell was starting for it when he heard a voice behind him.
scene_description: indoors, warehouse interior, wooden crates, dive gear rack, concrete floor

segment_text: "Hey, you! Hold it!"
scene_description: indoors, warehouse interior, wooden crates, dive gear rack, concrete floor

segment_text: Campbell ducked behind a wall of crates, saw a tiled hallway opening into the back of the building, and ran for it.
scene_description: indoors, warehouse interior, wooden crates, dive gear rack, concrete floor

segment_text: He didn't get more than three or four steps before a uniformed guard stepped out and pointed a .38 at his chest.
scene_description: indoors, warehouse interior, wooden crates, dive gear rack, concrete floor

segment_text: "You can leave him with me."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "Are you sure, Dr. Kimberly?"
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "I'll be all right," she said. "I'll call you if there's any trouble."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: Campbell collapsed in a plastic chair across from her desk. The office was strictly functional--waterproof and mildew-resistant.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: A long window behind Kimberly's head showed the lagoon and the row of marker buoys.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "How much did you see?" she asked.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "I don't know. I saw what looked like farms. Some machinery."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: She slid a photograph across the desk to him. It showed a creature with a woman's breasts and the tail of a fish.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: The face was close enough to Kimberly's to be her sister. Or her clone's.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: Campbell suddenly realized the amount of trouble he was in.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "The boy at the farmacia works for us," Kimberly said.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: Campbell nodded. Of course he did. Where else would he get a computer?
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "You can have the picture," Campbell said, blinking the sweat out of his eyes. "And the negative."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "Let's be realistic," she said, tapping the keys of her CRT and studying the screen. "Even if we let you keep your job, I don't see how we could hold your marriage together. And then you have two kids to put through college..."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: She shook her head. "Your brain is full of hot information. There are too many people who would pay to have it, and there are just too many ways you can be manipulated. You're not much of a risk, Mister Campbell."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: She radiated hurt and betrayal, and he wanted to slink away from her in shame.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: She got up and looked out the window. "We're building the future here," she said.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "A future we couldn't even imagine fifteen years ago. And that's just too valuable to let one person screw up. Plentiful food, cheap energy, access to a computer net for the price of a TV set, a whole new form of government--"
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "I've seen your future," Campbell said. "Your boats have killed the reef for over a mile around the hotel. Your Coke cans are lying all over the coral bed. Your marriages don't last and your kids are on drugs and your TV is garbage. I'll pass."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "Did you see that boy in the drugstore? He's learning calculus on that computer, and his parents can't even read and write. We're testing a vaccine on human subjects that will probably prevent leukemia. We've got laser surgery and transplant techniques that are revolutionary. Literally."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "Is that where she came from?" Campbell asked, pointing to the photograph.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: Kimberly's voice dropped. "It's synergistic, don't you see? To do the transplants we had to be able to clone cells from the donor. To clone cells we had to have laser manipulation of the genes..."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "They cloned your cells? Just for practice?"
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: She nodded slowly. "Something happened. She grew, but she stopped developing, kept her embryonic form from the waist down. There was nothing we could do except ... make the best of it."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: Campbell took a longer look at the picture. No, not the romantic myth he had first imagined.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: The tail was waxy looking in the harsh light of the strobe, the fins more clearly undeveloped legs. He stared at the photo in queasy fascination.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "You could have let her die."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "No. She was mine. I don't have much, and I wouldn't give her up." Kimberly's fists clenched at her sides.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "She's not unhappy, she knows who I am. In her own way I suppose she cares for me." She paused, looking at the floor.
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "I'm a lonely woman, Campbell. But of course you know that."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: Campbell's throat was dry. "What about me?" he rasped, and managed to swallow. "Am I going to die?"
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: "No," she said. "Not you either...."
scene_description: indoors, functional office interior, desk, window view lagoon, CRT screen

segment_text: Campbell swam for the fence. His memories were cloudy and he had trouble focusing his thoughts, but he could visualize the gap in the net and the open ocean beyond it.
scene_description: underwater, open ocean expanse, sunlit clear water, receding island distant

segment_text: He kicked down easily to 120 feet, the water cool and comforting on his naked skin. Then he was through, drifting gently away from the noise and stink of the island, toward some primal vision of peace and timelessness.
scene_description: underwater, open ocean expanse, sunlit clear water, receding island distant

segment_text: His gills rippled smoothly as he swam.
scene_description: underwater, open ocean expanse, sunlit clear water, receding island distant
